description: Accepts an offer to share the specified portfolio.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: PortfolioShareType
parameters.description: The type of shared portfolios to accept. The default is to accept imported portfolios. AWS_ORGANIZATIONS - Accept portfolios shared by the management account of your organization. IMPORTED - Accept imported portfolios. AWS_SERVICECATALOG - Not supported. (Throws ResourceNotFoundException.) For example, aws servicecatalog accept-portfolio-share --portfolio-id "port-2qwzkwxt3y5fk" --portfolio-share-type AWS_ORGANIZATIONS.
